name: INAirline
desc: The information that describes an airline.

items.name: init(name: String?, iataCode: String?, icaoCode: String?)
items.desc: Creates a new airline object with the specified contents and attributes.

items.name: var iataCode: String?
items.desc: The two-letter International Air Transport Association (IATA) code for the airline.

items.name: var icaoCode: String?
items.desc: The three-letter International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) code for the airline.
